meanings.definition: Valines (noun): plural form of valine, an essential amino acid
meanings.sent1: The valines in the protein help build muscles.
meanings.sent2: She bought a supplement with valines for her workout.
meanings.sent3: The valines in the shake made it a muscle-building potion.
meanings.sent4: His body was a fortress, fortified by valines.
meanings.sent5: The valines acted as the construction workers of the body, building strength.

meanings.definition: Valines (verb): third person singular present of valine, to add valine to something
meanings.sent1: He valines his smoothie every morning for extra protein.
meanings.sent2: The chef valines the dish with a sprinkle of valine powder.
meanings.sent3: She valines her breakfast cereal to boost her energy.
meanings.sent4: The garden valines the soil with nutrients for healthy plants.
meanings.sent5: Adding valines to the mix valines the nutritional value of the meal.

meanings.definition: Valines (adjective): relating to or containing valine
meanings.sent1: The valines supplement is great for athletes.
meanings.sent2: She prefers valines-rich foods for her diet.
meanings.sent3: The valines salad dressing adds a unique flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent4: His valines smoothie was the secret to his energy.
meanings.sent5: The valines aroma filled the kitchen, enticing everyone to try the dish.
